nodes.text: A medium repulsortank was a type of hovering tank that used repulsorlift technology to propel each vehicle forward. These repulsortanks did not have the same armor or firepower as a heavy repulsortank. Nor did they have the same speed, mobility and maneuverability as an light repulsortank. Instead, they were supposed to be a combination of the best element from both classes. Sometimes the opposite happened.

Medium repulsortank was an official classification the Imperial army. Eight of the these, would be part of an imperial armor platoon. In contrast to the four heavy repulsortanks. This could be doubled with the addition of four more armor sections. Each armor section would have two medium repulsortank.
